title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1801.1 - Approval of urban renewal plan
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1801.1 - Approval of urban renewal plan

State Regulations

No resolution authorizing the acquisition of real
property shall be adopted by a municipality or agency until an urban renewal
plan has been approved by the governing body, either for the entire designated
area or for a part or portion of the designated area, as is proposed for
acquisition, unless early acquisition is to be undertaken. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1801.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
